resources.string:
Swish relies on the contact information saved in the phone to notify you the Birthdays.
 
 To get Birthday notification please update the contact information with birth dates.
 
 Follow the below steps :
 
 	 1) Go to People/Contacts app,
 	 2) Open the contact whose birth date you want to add
 	 3) Select Menu -> Edit
 	 4) Click Add another field -> Special Dates (Birthday)
 	 5) Done!
 
 For any queries reach out to code.fu.pandas@gmail.com
